com.amazon.device.associates
Class OpenSearchPageRequest

java.lang.Object
  com.amazon.device.associates.OpenRetailPageRequest
      com.amazon.device.associates.OpenSearchPageRequest

public class OpenSearchPageRequest
extends OpenRetailPageRequest

Object of OpenSearchPageRequest is passed to LinkService.openRetailPage(com.amazon.device.associates.OpenRetailPageRequest) to build a link to amazon retail search page with products in Amazon product catalog using keywords and category. To initiate link building for retail search page, specify the keyword, category OpenSearchPageRequest.

          Creates a new OpenSearchPageRequest for the keyword specified as parameter.

          Creates a new OpenSearchPageRequest for the category and keyword specified as parameters.
